weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen in winter.
🌬️ You can make snowballs with me.
🌨️ I am made of frozen water.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I come out during the day.
🧴 You need sunscreen when I'm out.
🌻 Plants turn to face me.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make everything wet. You might need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ Pitter-patter, pitter-patter.
☔ Ducks love to play in me.
💦 I am water falling from clouds.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I often come with rain.
👂 You can hear me.
💥 Boom!

weather.question: I am white and puffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ Airplanes fly through me.
🐑 I can look like different animals.
💧 I am made of tiny water droplets.

weather.question: I am strong and can blow things around. Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm wild. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall from trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I'm around.
🌬️ I am moving air.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I am small and hard, like tiny ice balls. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Ouch! I can hurt when I hit you.
⚾ I am bigger than snow, but smaller than ice cubes.
🥶 I fall during a thunderstorm sometimes.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, made when the sun shines through the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
✨ People say there's a pot of gold at my end.
☀️ I need both sun and rain to exist.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. I form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🏡 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌊 I am a type of tropical cyclone.

weather.question: I am water in the air that makes it hard to see. I look like a cloud on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You need to drive carefully when I'm around.
👻 I can make things look spooky.
🌫️ I am made of tiny water droplets suspended in the air.

ocean.question: I’m very big and salty and full of water, boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Fish swim in me.
🚢 You need a boat to cross me.
🏖️ I'm next to the beach.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I can sometimes be found on the sand near the ocean, but I also live in gardens and other places. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.
🐌 I am not very fast.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🫴 I use my arms to grab things.
💦 I can squirt ink.

ocean.question: I have a big mouth and lots of teeth, and I swim in the ocean. People are scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I like to eat fish.
🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 You don't want to see my teeth!

ocean.question: I’m a mammal that lives in the ocean, I’m very big and sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I breathe air through a hole on my head.
🎶 I make sounds under water.
🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and bright.
🧱 I live in a coral city.
🎨 I can be many colors at once.

ocean.question: I'm a place under the sea where plants and animals live together. It's very colorful and fragile. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many creatures call me home.
☀️ I need sunlight to survive.
🪸 I am made of tiny animals.

ocean.question: I am the tallest underwater plant that creates forests for sea creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I look like trees underwater.
🦦 Sea otters love to play in me.
🌊 I grow in cold, shallow waters.

ocean.question: I am the place where the land meets the sea, covered in sand and shells. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ You can build sandcastles on me.
🌊 The waves crash on me.
🐚 You can find seashells here.

ocean.question: I am a current that flows like a river in the ocean, carrying warm water far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I help keep Europe warm.
➡️ I move water around the world.
🌊 I start in the Gulf of Mexico.
